page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE...(2)
page.content:
...of MICHELLE McHUGH (cont.)
{ 1:15 We did some work on the { Domesday Project { 2:15 playtime { 2:30 We came back into class; { we went down to the hall & { did some reading, while our { teacher did some work on the { Domesday Project, using the { computer { 3:30 end of school { 4:00 some of us went to Moor Lane { (another local primary { school) for a sports meeting; { I was running in the relay. { 6:30 We arrived back at school. { 6:49 Samantha & I arrived at my { house { 7:00 We watched "Eastenders" { 7:30 We had dinner {
